sections.title: How the Western Union referral bonus works (USA only)
content: Western Union offers a referral program available exclusively to users in the United States.
New users who sign up through a referral link and send at least $100 via online transfer receive a $10 Amazon gift card.
The referrer earns a $15 Amazon gift card for each referred friend who completes the required transfer.
Transfers must be made through westernunion.com (USA) or the Western Union app (USA version).

sections.title: Eligibility and requirements
content: The promotion is only valid for users with a registered Western Union profile in the United States.
The referred user must register using a referral link and complete a transfer of at least $100 within 30 days.
Transfers must be successfully approved and received to qualify.
Each referrer can earn up to 20 referral rewards during the entire promotional period.
Amazon gift cards are sent via email within 15 business days after requirements are verified.
Amazon gift cards are subject to Amazon.com (USA) terms and conditions.
Self-referrals, fake accounts, or abusive behavior will result in disqualification and forfeiture of rewards.

sections.title: Step-by-step guide to earn the reward
content: 1. A registered Western Union (USA) user generates a referral link from the 'Refer a Friend' section.
2. The referred person registers using that link on the Western Union website or mobile app (USA version).
3. The new user must send at least $100 via online transfer within 30 days of signing up.
4. The transfer must be completed from a U.S.-based profile and successfully received by the recipient.
5. After validation, both the referrer and referee receive an Amazon gift card by email: $10 for the new user, $15 for the inviter.
